head_commit.message:
docs(2VmTimer): add detailed guide for setting up and running 2VM timer example

- Include instructions for cloning repositories and setting up the project
- Provide steps to compile and load nimbos for both VM1 and VM2
- Describe how to create and mount the disk image
- Explain how to start the VMM and connect to the serial port
- Include sample output for both VM1 and VM2

head_commit.message:
feat(vmm): implement virtual timer and IRQ handling

- Add virtual timer support for VMs
- Implement IRQ handling in vCPU run loop
- Update cargo files to use local paths for dependencies
- Remove unused VM configuration file

run.display_title: feat(vmm): implement virtual timer and IRQ handling
